key.name: name
key.description: This setting is only used if Metacity is selected as theme type. You MUST provide valid Metacity theme name, otherwise Metacity will fall back to default GTK+ theme - Adwaita.

key.name: type
key.description:
Metacity supports two theme types - GTK+ (gtk.css) and Metacity (metacity-theme-x.xml).
GTK+ theme: all data is loaded from CSS. This is same theme that is used by mutter for server side decorations and by GTK+ for client side decorations.
Metacity theme: data is loaded from metacity-theme-x.xml and css. Using this theme type you MUST provide valid theme name.
